Posts.Content: Surgery down for next Thursday. Quicker than I thought but less time to worry. So glad things are happening after what seems l8ke an eternity. Thanks for thinking of me it does help. Henty xx
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Hi Janet, I am coping better than I was, feel better now things are going ahead, felt so lost this time last week. All hugs are appreciated!! Hentyxx
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Hello., Recovering well from op last Thursday. Not much pain but finding the drains a nuisance as can't get comfy in bed! Been out today and have been pottering about with no trouble. Feel much better mentally too, trying not to go to the dark places. Thanks for your concern. Henty xx
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Diagnosed Wednesday, been in limbo since then. Feel like life is over and that I can't cope.
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: After diagnosis Wed 3 April not heard from anyone about  my referral. Feel so abandoned and afraid. Can't sleep or eat. I know other people say this is the worst time. Henty xx
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Thanks for your reply it helped. I now have an appointment with the consultant next Thursday so things are moving. Been away for a few days and did feel better to get away for a while. My family are wonderful and helping me get through. Love Henty xx
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Bad couple of days as I wait to see the consultant on Thursday. Trying hard to be positive but my thoughts go to dark places. Hentyxx
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Hello Angela, Better day today, had scans, but afraid of what they may find. Appointment next week. Trying to be positive. Love Henty xx
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Help! Went for results after mastectomy 2 weeks ago today and was told I needed CT scan and a bone scan before chemo. Now terrified what they will find. Are these scans routine? Henty xx
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Hi Janet,  Recovering fine, like you some underarm pain, but otherwise good. No one mentioned the scans before so wasn't expecting them just thought I'd get a treatment plan. Wondered if they suspected something. Feel I've taken a step back today on my journey forward. Love Hentyxx
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Pre med tomorrow then surgery Thursday. Feeling so scared can't  breath. Last couple of days have been awful. Everyone so supportive but it's so hard. Henty xx
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.
